ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Do_Not_Email__c && ISPICKVAL(Deal_Announcements__c,'')&& ISPICKVAL( Events_Conferences__c,'')&& ISPICKVAL( General_Announcements__c,'')&& ISPICKVAL( InsightsContent__c,'')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate which email type(s) the Contact has opted out of below:
